author: BBC News
title: Aleppo battle: Rebels 'to leave' - Russian ambassador
description: A deal is agreed for Syrian rebel fighters to leave eastern Aleppo, Russia's UN ambassador says.

author: BBC News
title: Aleppo: George Osborne attacks 'vacuum' of Western leadership
description: George Osborne says a "vacuum of Western leadership" helped lead to the situation in Syria.

author: BBC News
title: Talks to halt Southern strike announced
description: Rail bosses and union chiefs agree to hold talks in a bid to resolve the long-running Southern rail dispute.

author: BBC News
title: Southern Rail chaos: Commuters video blog journeys
description: Four Southern Rail passengers video blog their mornings during the strike action.

author: BBC News
title: Nine convicted over student visa English test plot
description: Nine people are convicted of an immigration fraud linked to English language tests used for student visas.

author: BBC News
title: Met Police football abuse inquiry covers 30 clubs
description: Police receive 106 sex abuse allegations relating to 30 London football clubs, including four in the Premier League.

author: BBC News
title: 'Huge concern' as teen moped crime in London rises
description: Crime involving mopeds has gone up by more than 600 per cent in London in the past two years, BBC London can reveal.

author: BBC News
title: 'Huge concern' as teen moped crime in London rises
description: Crime involving mopeds has gone up by more than 600 per cent in London in the past two years, BBC London can reveal.

author: BBC News
title: UK inflation at two-year high as clothing prices rise
description: The biggest rise in clothing prices in six years helps push the UK inflation rate up to 1.2% in November.

author: BBC News
title: Trump picks Exxon chief Rex Tillerson for secretary of state
description: A top energy executive with strong ties to Russia is lined up as US secretary of state.
